data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Leptolalax (Anura, Megophryidae) from Hunan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hou, Yinmeng, Zhang, Mengfei, Hu, Fei, Li, Siyuan, Shi, Shengchao, Chen, Jun, Mo, Xiaoyang (2018): A new species of the genus Leptolalax (Anura, Megophryidae) from Hunan, China. Zootaxa 4444 (3): 247-266, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4444.3.2
